mapper.sql: USER_ID, USER_NICKNAME, USER_SEX, USER_BIRTHDAY, USER_SCHOOL, USER_POSITION, USER_LOVESTATE, USER_SIGNATURE
mapper.insert: insert into userinfo (USER_ID, USER_NICKNAME, USER_SEX, USER_BIRTHDAY, USER_SCHOOL, USER_POSITION, USER_LOVESTATE, USER_SIGNATURE) values (#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userNickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userSex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{userBirthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{userSchool,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userLovestate,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{userSignature,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update userinfo
USER_NICKNAME = #{userNickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_SEX = #{userSex,jdbcType=TINYINT},
USER_BIRTHDAY = #{userBirthday,jdbcType=DATE},
USER_SCHOOL = #{userSchool,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_POSITION = #{userPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_LOVESTATE = #{userLovestate,jdbcType=TINYINT},
USER_SIGNATURE = #{userSignature,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
